from notebookutils import mssparkutils

timeout_in_seconds = 60 * 30

# Builds DIMs
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_attribute_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_dataflow_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_dpia_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_dsa_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_entity_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_information_asset_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_integration_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_masterdata_map_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/IMS/Historic/ims_ropa_dim_historic', timeout_in_seconds)
